item.title: Disable Keyboard
item.dc:creator: @_doyley _doyley
item.description:
@_doyley wrote:

public class KillMouse {
   public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {	
     Process p = Runtime.getRuntime()
     .exec("RunDll32.exe RunDll32.exe KEYBOARD,disable");
     p.waitFor();
     System.out.println("Mouse Disabled");
     }
}

Should work on all apart from vista or windows 2003

Read full topic
